Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Level Description: Proficient (shows most elements clearly and correctly)
CAN: The student can illustrate a string telephone being used by two students to communicate over a distance.
The student can represent the scientific idea of sound traveling along the string, showing the basic concept of communication via the device.
The student can show tools and materials like cups and string used to design the string telephone.
The student can partially demonstrate the importance of this technology for communication, possibly by indicating the separation of the students.
CANNOT: The student may not clearly indicate the direction of sound travel along the string (e.g., no arrows or inconsistent representation).
The student may omit or incorrectly label some elements in the drawing (e.g., forgetting to label components like cups or string).
